interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr.Who Xmas Specials (Giftset/BD) Review Date: 2015/12/22 Store: Various (Actor, Director) Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['AMAZON EXCLUSIVE GIFTSET WITH BLUETOOTH SPEAKER:', 'Doctor Who: Christmas Specials Giftset with TARDIS Speakers [Blu-ray]', 'For the first time on one complete set, own every Christmas special from the new generation of Doctor Who. David Tennant, Matt Smith and Peter Capaldi all take starring turns in eleven exhilarating Christmas specials that set the Doctor rushing to save the world from an array of dastardly foes including the Master, the Cybermen and even Santa Clause himself.', 'Set includes the following:', '11 Doctor Who Christmas Specials', '(3 discs):', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE CHRISTMAS INVASION', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE RUNAWAY BRIDE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 VOYAGE OF THE DAMNED', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE NEXT DOCTOR', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE END OF TIME, PART ONE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE END OF TIME, PART TWO', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 A CHRISTMAS CAROL', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE DOCTOR, THE WIDOW, AND THE WARDROBE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE SNOWMEN', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 THE TIME OF THE DOCTOR', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 LAST CHRISTMAS', 'TARDIS Bluetooth Speaker', "This Doctor Who TARDIS Wireless Bluetooth Speaker will seamlessly pair with most any Bluetooth device. It features meticulous craftsmanship and incredible sound quality, making it highly desirable to collectors and audiophiles alike. The easy-to-use interface allows for an array of control options, while LED indicators let you know when you power the device on and when you're connected.", 'Features:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Sound clips include Materialize, Dematerialize, Cloister Bell, Flight, and Turbulence!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Top LED flashes and the Police Box sign illuminates! Perfect for Doctor Who collectors and audiophiles alike. Wireless Doctor Who speakers!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Made of super-rigid ABS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 The Police Box sign illuminates when connected to a device.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Auxiliary In/Out for linking multiple models together for surround sound', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Built-in omnidirectional microphone for phone calls with noise cancellation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Multifunction interface for Volume / Play / Pause / >> /', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Battery indicator display / voice battery low indicator', 'Specifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 3 1/2-foot 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and 3-foot micro USB charging cable included', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Connectivity: wireless Bluetooth or 3.5 mm auxiliary', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Wireless range: 33 feet / 10 meters', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Battery: 10-hour life via rechargeable lithium-ion', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Speakers: 2-inch high-power and 2 1/2-inch passive bass radiator', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 USB-rechargeable lithium-ion battery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 TARDIS measures about 8 1/2-inches tall x 4 2/5-inches wide x 4 2/5-inches long.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 For ages 6 and up.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '43382038', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, NTSC', 'Run time': '9 hours', 'Release date': 'November 24, 2015', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: I love the Tardis speaker. It charges quickly with the USB cable. The instructions say it should be able to hook up with your computer if attached by the USB cable, but I have only been able to get it to connect to my aging 2008 MacBook Pro by using the Bluetooth connection. It pairs excellently with my iPhone and iPad also. A total treat for this Whovian.

In a comment to another post I listed all the episodes included in the three disk set, and I am repeating this info below as it is not included in the item information by Amazon. I am giving this only 4 stars because the DVD set arrived with the middle piece to one of the DVD holders half broken, making it impossible to securely stow one of them when not in use. All three DVD's were loose in the case on arrival but fortunately not scratched and all played well.

Tenth Doctor David Tennant specials---
The Christmas Invasion
The Runaway Bride
Voyage of the Damned
The Next Doctor
The End Of Time, Part One
The End Of Time, Part Two

Eleventh Doctor Matt Smith specials--
A Christmas Carol
The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe
The Snowmen
The Time of the Doctor

Twelfth Doctor Peter Capaldi special--
Last Christmas

There is also a bonus feature called Ten Christmases: "in this exclusive new feature Rufus Hound is on a mission to discover what makes a Doctor Who Christmas Special so special!" Review Title: Super gift for your favorite Whovian Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** Enjoys high-quality writing and strong acting in series/movies, with a particular affinity for historical or cultural themes. The user continues to appreciate complex psychological narratives, including those exploring PTSD. Recent interactions reflect a fondness for iconic series and their associated merchandise, indicating a strong emotional connection to the content. They still value fresh perspectives in adaptations and storytelling. 

- **Geographic Interest:** Maintains a keen interest in British culture and history, particularly narratives related to Hong Kong's past, underscoring their deep engagement with culturally rooted stories.

- **Rating Pattern:** Has a high average rating of around 4.4, demonstrating a commitment to quality storytelling but has also shown flexibility, recently rating a product 4.0 despite some issues with quality, highlighting their nuanced approach to critique.

- **Language and Accessibility:** Prefers English-language content with closed captions, emphasizing accessibility, which is consistently important in their viewing experience.

- **Cultural Insight:** Appreciates narratives that provide in-depth analyses of historical events and cultural phenomena. The user is open to controversial perspectives while maintaining a critical stance on storytelling integrity.

Overall, the user gravitates toward well-crafted productions that blend quality storytelling with cultural or historical insights, reinforced by their passion for beloved series and collectibles related to those stories.
